messages.title: Welcome to Plot Twist! üëã
messages.body: Thanks for trying Plot Twist! We're a small indie team and your feedback means everything. Join our Discord and say hi!

messages.title: New: Where to Watch üçø
messages.body: Plot Twist now shows you which streaming platforms have your shows, based on your country. Tap any platform to open it directly.
